data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Acevedo-Rodriguez, Pedro, Brewer, Steven W. (2016): Spatheliabelizensis, a new species and first record for the genus in Central America (tribe Spathelieae, Rutaceae). PhytoKeys 75: 145-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.10015, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.10015
